verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) <S%H8199>Vindicate<s%> me, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H8537>integrity;<s%> And I have <S%H982>trusted<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H4571>wavering.<s%>
<S%H974>Examine<s%> me, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H5254>try<s%> me; <S%H6884>Test<s%> my <S%H3629>mind<s%> and my <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
For Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> And I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> in Thy <S%H571>truth.<s%>
I do not <S%H3427>sit<s%> with <S%H7723>deceitful<s%> <S%H4962>men,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> will I <S%H935>go<s%> with <S%H5956>pretenders.<s%>
I <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers,<s%> And I will not <S%H3427>sit<s%> with the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
I shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> in <S%H5356>innocence,<s%> And I will <S%H5437>go<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> Thine <S%H4196>altar,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>
That I may <S%H8085>proclaim<s%> with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> And <S%H5608>declare<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> Thy <S%H6381>wonders.<s%>
O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H4583>habitation<s%> of Thy <S%H1004>house,<s%> And the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H4908>where<s%> Thy <S%H9202>glory<s%> <S%H4908>dwells.<s%>
Do not <S%H622>take<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H622>away<s%> [along] with <S%H2400>sinners,<s%> <S%H408>Nor<s%> my <S%H9132>life<s%> with <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1818>bloodshed,<s%>
In <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> is a <S%H2154>wicked<s%> <S%H2154>scheme,<s%> And whose <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H7810>bribes.<s%>
But as for me, I shall <S%H1980>walk<s%> in my <S%H8537>integrity;<s%> <S%H6299>Redeem<s%> me, and be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to me.
My <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H5975>stands<s%> on a <S%H4334>level<s%> <S%H4334>place;<s%> In the <S%H4721>congregations<s%> I shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
